programme.title: Tariq El Ward
programme.desc: The series revolves around a young village woman who is fond of roses. When she faces a major problem that puts her in the center of family conflicts, she is forced to flee her village for the city in search of a better future, but her journey will be full of problems and difficulties.

programme.title: Bghit Hyatek
programme.desc: Three families have their lives turned upside down when they allow strangers to enter their world and destroy it.

programme.title: L'Maktoub
programme.desc: As a family seeks to keep its inheritance, its members decide to marry off Omar Al-Maatawi to his brother's wife after his death in order to achieve that end, but Omar's heart is attached to the girl Hind, who looks very similar to his deceased wife.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.title: Kadin
programme.desc: Bahar meets Sarp on a ship , they fall in love and get married. Bahar gives birth to a girl named Nisan and a young boy, Doruk, but her life turns upside down when her husband disappears from their lives and she's forced to face life with her two children alone.

programme.title: El Fed TV 3
programme.desc: The sitcom presents a number of satirical segments that address, through various figures in Moroccan society, many social issues, in an attempt to present them in an interesting comedic way.

programme.title: Jib Darkoum
programme.desc: It follows the dentist Mohsen, who falls in love with a girl from a rich family, and since he is an orphan, he lies to her and introduces her to a fake family who proposes to her family. Hilarity ensues when he is forced to live with the lie during the dating period that will last a month under one roof.

programme.title: 2 Wjouh
programme.desc: The series takes place in the city of Casablanca and tells the story of one of the slums in which begging and poverty are widespread, through stories from the class that suffers in Moroccan society.

programme.title: ‏Bnat Lahdid‏
programme.desc: Fatima is a young woman from a poor environment, who is distinguished by her strength and determination in overcoming life's difficulties. She works in her father's profession of selling used car supplies, until she meets a rich man and tries to get closer to him and his family. However, Fatima gets into serious problems and conflicts afterwards.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Kong
programme.desc: The epic battle between the two mightiest monsters on the planet will unfold, as a mission into uncharted territory to uncover clues about the origins of the Titans reveals a conspiracy that could terminate all the creatures.

programme.title: Pele: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: A biography about the legendary football player Pelé that chronicles his rise from poverty in Sao Paulo and his persistent honing of his skills to his participation in the World Cup where he led Brazil to its first World Cup victory at the age of 17.

programme.title: Operation Avalanche
programme.desc: When CIA agents are sent to NASA to discern the possibility of them having a Russian spy in their midst, their undercover mission eventually reveals a stunning conspiracy within their own government that revolves around the Apollo space program.

programme.title: Boundless
programme.desc: After setting sail from Spain, Juan Sebastián Elcano and Ferdinand Magellan embarked on a historic journey around the world.

programme.title: Legally Blonde
programme.desc: When wealthy sorority queen (Elle Woods) is dumped by her Harvard law student boyfriend (Warner) who thinks she is not serious and may get in the way of his political future. She decides to go to Harvard to study law to prove him wrong.

programme.title: Legally Blonde 2
programme.desc: This time, Elle Woods is on a pursuit to stop animal testing, so much so that she decides to put her wedding plans on hold to go to Washington to pass a bill supporting her cause.

programme.title: Al Washm
programme.desc: The series takes place in an old Levantine neighborhood, where it showcases the intertwined human relationships of the neighborhood’s residents, and the overt and hidden conflicts that take place between them.

programme.title: Aghmed Aynayk
programme.desc: Zaid is a special needs child. Doctors diagnose his condition with being on the autism spectrum, so Mu’nis, his mother’s friend, takes care of him as he is affected by his psychological state, and tries to provide him with a stable and normal life.

programme.title: Al Sadeeqat
programme.desc: A businesswoman seeks to exploit some girls to achieve her personal interests by having them work as dancers and forcing them to do whatever she asks, whatever it is, and the stories of these women come across each other.

programme.title: Bayt Ahly
programme.desc: The events take place in the 1940s, after Nouri leaves prison, a major conflict arises between him and Abu Adnan, coinciding with the assassination of the doctor, Abdul Rahman Al Shahbandar.

programme.title: Mal El Qabban
programme.desc: The events of the series take place inside Al-Hal Market in Damascus, highlighting the conditions of the Syrians, through the story of the Noman Al Zeer family and the events and problems they are exposed to.

programme.title: Al Arabji 2
programme.desc: Events escalate in the second season of the series, and Abdou the coachman seeks revenge and retaliation against his enemies, especially Al Nashwati, who allied this time with Doria. On the other hand, Zumuruda, who fleed from cruelty and oppression, does not know which path her fate will take her.

programme.title: Kasr Adm 2: Al Saradib
programme.desc: In the second season, Abu Rayyan returns with many secrets and cases, at the same time, Brigadier General Kanaan Al Sayegh is responsible for uncovering corruption cases and confronting their perpetrators.

programme.title: Arees Taht Al Talab
programme.desc: The events revolve around a group of people searching for love and marriage, and going through different circumstances. Dana creates an association for dating and reconciliation of loved ones, and the events continue.

programme.title: Al Khataya
programme.desc: Through six groups of five episodes, the work tells six stories about people who make mistakes and continue to make mistakes, but they lead them towards the abyss, and they drag other people with them.

Amitabh Bachchan, Ayushmann Khurrana, Vijay Raaz, Srishti Shrivastava, Farrukh Jaffar, Shoojit Sircar, Juhi Chaturvedi

programme.title: Woh Toh Hai Albela (Ep151)
programme.desc: Bollywood, Drama, Romance 2022 Two brothers are tangled in a love triangle when one of them marries the lover of the other which complicates the lives of the three of them and they endeavor to get out of this trouble. Shaheer Shiekh, Hiba Nawab, Pallavi Pradhan, Jharna Narwani, Kinshuk Vaidya, Romesh Kalra, Manali Karia

programme.title: Lost In Someone's Love (Ep141)
programme.desc: Drama, Romance, Bollywood 2020 Sai Joshi dreams of joining the Nagpur Medical College and becoming a doctor one day, but her steps are hindered when her family forces her to marry an IPS officer who is in love with another woman, so they make a secret deal that comforts both of them. Ayesha Singh, Neil Bhatt, Aishwarya Sharma Bhatt, Sanjivani Amit Takkar, Kishori Shahane, Jaydeep Sen, Rajesh Chawla

programme.title: She Looks Great (Ep11)
programme.desc: Drama, Romance, Bollywood 2021 Priya lives in her family home with her mother and sisters. She suffers in her life and believes that there is no place for love in her, after her lover left her to marry her sister. Nakuul Mehta, Disha Parmar, Amit Singh Thakur, Rohan Kapoor, Alefia Kapadia, Jyoti Tiwari, Ekta Kapoor, Sahir Raza

programme.title: Love By Force (Ep269)
programme.desc: Romance, Bollywood, Drama 2009 Naitik and Akshara are forced to marry, while love brings Kartik and Naira together, revealing the difference between love-based relationships and forced marriage. Hina Khan, Karan Mehra, Ayush Agarwal, Shivangi Joshi, Mohsin Khan, Romesh Kalra, Zama Habib

programme.title: Heropanti
programme.desc: Romance, Action, Bollywood 2014 An impossible love story between Pablo and Dempis that stands in the face of ancient traditions and terrorism that threatens their lives and their city. programme.title: Al Sharar
programme.desc: The events take place between a desert and a neighboring village between the Hijaz and Najd, where a woman reveals, while collecting firewood, a scandal that develops and intertwines into larger and larger stories, and secrets hidden behind her.

programme.desc: Thriller, Drama, People 2024 In the 1990s, a series of abductions grip the city, sending shockwaves through the community. Shejoon Al Hagery, Abdullah Boushahri, Shaimaa Seif, Maram Albaloshy, Mohamed Hashem, Manaf Abdal, Mohmed KHaled Al Nashmy

programme.title: Al Sharar
programme.desc: The events take place between a desert and a neighboring village between the Hijaz and Najd, where a woman reveals, while collecting firewood, a scandal that develops and intertwines into larger and larger stories, and secrets hidden behind her.

programme.title: The Fire (Ep3)

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1970
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of hits & headlines from a year of firsts - 18 year olds were allowed to vote in the UK, Hawaii Five-O arrived on the TV & the 747 Jumbo launched from Heathrow!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1971
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year Gary Barlow, David Tennant and Clare Balding were born. And the UK said goodbye to pounds, shillings & pence as we went decimal!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1972
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from a year of major cultural debuts - Jesus Christ Superstar, Are You Being Served? and George, Zippy & Bungle in Rainbow!

programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of hits and headlines served with a side order of flares! It was a busy year for the Queen as she opened the Sydney Opera House and the new London Bridge.

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1974
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes from the year Richard Nixon left the US Presidency after Watergate, Prog Rock dominated the album charts & inflation hit double digits. Imagine that!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1975
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year Margaret Thatcher became Tory leader, Ding-a-Dong won Eurovision, and Fawlty Towers opened its doors for the very first time!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1976
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of heatwave hits & headlines from a year of contrasts - Punk, Dancing Queen, the Inter-City 125, the Honey Monster & that year's top toy - Swingball!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1977
programme.desc: 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the year Demis Roussos soundtracked Abigail's Party. Punk was the new scourge of society, but it was outsold by TV cop crooner David Soul!

programme.title: Simon Bates New Golden Hour: 1978
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of hits and headlines from the penultimate year of the decade when Anna Ford became ITV's first ever female news reader and the TV licence fee climbed to £25!
